about_the_game:
Welcome to Pie O'clock! In our cafe, you will find the best coffee, the tastiest pies and... The sweetest girls!

Meet sarcastic waitress Charlotte, strict but fair manager Honey and optimistic student Toffee.

Wait... someone's missing. Where's Candice? What do you mean, "disappeared"?!

🍰🍰🍰🍰🍰

In this visual novel, you'll try on the roles of student, waiter, and detective, rack your brains a couple of times, drink at least ten cups of coffee, and, if you're careful, solve a few mysteries.

By the way, did you know that the sweetest girls keep the darkest secrets?

content_descriptors.notes: Content may be disturbing to some audiences.

detailed_description:
Welcome to Pie O'clock! In our cafe, you will find the best coffee, the tastiest pies and... The sweetest girls!

Meet sarcastic waitress Charlotte, strict but fair manager Honey and optimistic student Toffee.

Wait... someone's missing. Where's Candice? What do you mean, "disappeared"?!

🍰🍰🍰🍰🍰

In this visual novel, you'll try on the roles of student, waiter, and detective, rack your brains a couple of times, drink at least ten cups of coffee, and, if you're careful, solve a few mysteries.

By the way, did you know that the sweetest girls keep the darkest secrets?

short_description: Welcome to Pie O'clock! In our cafe, you will find the best coffee, the tastiest pies and... The sweetest girls! A non-linear visual novel. Warning, content may be disturbing
